mapper.insert: insert into b_user (name, password, role, status) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.select: select u.name, u.password, u.role, u.status, s.company, s.seller_tax_id from b_user u left join b_seller s on u.name = s.merchant_name
select u.name, u.password, u.role, u.status, s.company, s.seller_tax_id from b_user u left join b_seller s on u.name = s.merchant_name where u.name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
